{{Wired embedded system |brand=Synology |model=DiskStation |revision=DS1819+ |asin=B07KMKDW42 |newegg=N82E16822108168 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf= |availability=now |est_release_date= |fcc_date= |fcc_id= |type=NAS |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=0.3 |pwr_conn=C7 |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |pwr_vac=true |cpu1_brand=Intel Atom |cpu1_model=C3538 |cpu1_cspeed=2.1 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=4 GiB |ram1_brand= |ram1_model=DDR4 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, SATA, eSATA |expansion_usb_num=4 |expansion_sata_num=8 |jtag= |serial= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags=Link Aggregation |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|8-Bay Network Attached Storage (DS1819+)}} :[https://www.synology.com/en-global/products/DS1819+ Product page] {{â€¢}} [https://www.synology.com/en-global/support/download/DS1819+ Support page]
{{See also|Synology DiskStation Devices|List of NAS Devices}}
===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Intel Atom]] C3538 Quad Core @2.1GHz :(w/ AES-NI HW Encryption Engine) *Memory: 4GB DDR4 pre-installed (expandable up to 32GB) *Drive Type: 3.5" SATA HDD, 2.5" SATA HDD, 2.5" SATA SSD *Max Internal Capacity: Up to 18x drives (with two DX517) *External HDD Interface: 4x USB 3.0, 8x SATA, 2x eSATA *LAN: 4x GbE (w/ Failover and Link Aggregation supports)
